titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for a solemn and religious fast, to be keept in the whole paroch churches of the Kingdom of Scotland
Proclamations. 1681-06-16
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the sixteenth day of June, one thousand six hundred and eighty one, and of our reign, the thretty [sic] and third year.
Arms 232; Steele notation: France guinary proceeded.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
